description: This file defines an Angular component named BillingComponent, which displays subscription billing information, allows cancellation of subscriptions, and handles related UI interactions.

classes.name: BillingComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for managing and displaying subscription billing details, including the ability to cancel subscriptions.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the component and loads subscription data.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Method to cancel a subscription and refresh the data, handling success and error feedback.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Private method to fetch and populate the user's subscriptions.
